0.8.0.en: Added presence to the Timeline. Fixed rename bug. Migrated to SDK3.

0.7.4.en: Performance improvements. Fixed issue with first person, household member and guest triggers.

0.7.2.en: The port number can be configured from advanced settings. Increased check intervals for better performance. Better language support. Better performance.

0.7.1.en: The port number can be configured from advanced settings. Increased check intervals for better performance. Better language support.

0.7.0.en: The port number can be configured from advanced settings. Increased check intervals for better performance.

0.6.3.en: New version compatible with Homey firmware 5.x. Fixed issue with adding devices. Added token for user entered / user left triggers. Fixed missing capability.

0.6.2.en: New version compatible with Homey firmware 5.x. Fixed issue with adding devices. Added token for user entered / user left triggers.

0.6.1.en: New version compatible with Homey firmware 5.x. Fixed issue with adding devices.
